points.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
points.status: "Last Updated: Feb 22, 2021"

points.title: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents
points.status: "Except where we clearly indicate otherwise, ContextLogic does not endorse any Merchant, store, Product, or Product listing."

points.title: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data
points.status: "For questions or complaints regarding our data use practices or Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@contextlogic.com."

points.title: This service collects your IP address, which can be used to view your approximate location
points.status: "Examples of the information we collect automatically are: IP Address"

points.title: This service reserves the right to edit any content you post
points.status: "7.3 ContextLogic will be free to use, disclose, reproduce, modify, license, transfer and otherwise distribute, and exploit the User Submissions in any manner"

points.title: The service can delete your account without a reason upon two weeks' notice
points.status: "ContextLogic is also free to terminate (or suspend access to) your use of the Services or your account, for any reason in our discretion, including your breach of these Terms upon two weeks' notice. "

points.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
points.status: "Changes to the contractually agreed services and these Terms are deemed approved by you if you do not expressly object to them after receipt of the Notice of Changes. "

points.title: This service is only available to users over 13 years of age
points.status: "In order to use the Services, you must be 13 years old or older (or the age of consent set by applicable law) and be of legal age to form a binding contract (or if not, you've received your parent's or guardian's permission to use the Services and gotten your parent or guardian to agree to these Terms on your behalf). "

points.title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account
points.status: "You are not permitted to use the Services if: [...] (c) you have previously been banned from using any of our Services, unless we have reversed that ban, in our sole discretion."

points.title: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed
points.status: "We respect others' intellectual property rights, and we reserve the right to delete or disable Content alleged to be infringing such intellectual property rights, and to terminate the accounts of repeat alleged infringers"

points.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
points.status: "You're free to stop using the Services at any time."

points.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
points.status: "To the extent permitted by applicable law, ContextLogic limits or excludes its liability for: (i) your use of the Services, including any downtime or periods of unavailability; (ii) products, information or other content provided by third parties; (iii) the use of products purchased from Merchants; or (iv) any indirect, consequential or special damages. "

points.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
points.status: "To the extent permitted by applicable law, ContextLogic limits or excludes its liability for: (i) your use of the Services, including any downtime or periods of unavailability; (ii) products, information or other content provided by third parties; (iii) the use of products purchased from Merchants; or (iv) any indirect, consequential or special damages. "

points.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
points.status: "ContextLogic will provide appropriate notice regarding changes to the Services or these Terms ("Notice of Changes")."

points.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user or 500€
points.status: "Except for liability for death or personal injury caused by ContextLogic, ContextLogic's liability shall not exceed the greater of (i) the aggregate amount of your purchases on the Marketplace Apps in the six (6) months preceding the event on which your claim is based; or (ii) 500 Euro."

points.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content
points.status: "For all User Submissions, you hereby grant ContextLogic free of charge a royalty-free, perpetual, non-exclusive, transferable, sublicensable, worldwide license to use, store, display, reproduce, save, modify (e.g. for technical purposes, such as making sure your submission is viewable on an iPhone as well as a computer), create derivative works, perform, distribute, translate or otherwise act with respect to such User Submissions as we determine is necessary to operate, market and advertise the Services, including to present display or perform such User Submission in accordance with your preferences."

points.title: Users are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service
points.status: "Many items can be returned within 30 days of delivery and are eligible for a refund. Some items are treated differently. See the Exceptions section below to learn more about which items are treated differently and how. No matter the item type, if an item arrives and it is defective, damaged or wrong, it is eligible for a refund, but may need to be returned. "

points.title: This service keeps a license on user-generated content even after users close their accounts.
points.status: "For all User Submissions, you hereby grant ContextLogic free of charge a royalty-free, perpetual, non-exclusive, transferable, sublicensable, worldwide license to use, store, display, reproduce, save, modify (e.g. for technical purposes, such as making sure your submission is viewable on an iPhone as well as a computer), create derivative works, perform, distribute, translate or otherwise act with respect to such User Submissions as we determine is necessary to operate, market and advertise the Services, including to present display or perform such User Submission in accordance with your preferences."

points.title: This service can license user content to third parties
points.status: "For all User Submissions, you hereby grant ContextLogic free of charge a royalty-free, perpetual, non-exclusive, transferable, sublicensable, worldwide license to use, store, display, reproduce, save, modify (e.g. for technical purposes, such as making sure your submission is viewable on an iPhone as well as a computer), create derivative works, perform, distribute, translate or otherwise act with respect to such User Submissions as we determine is necessary to operate, market and advertise the Services, including to present display or perform such User Submission in accordance with your preferences."

points.title: Users have a reduced time period (2 years) to take legal action against the service
points.status: Claims arising out of or related to the Services become time-barred within two (2) years provided that they do not result from injury to life, body or health and slight negligence has not been ruled out.

points.title: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly
points.status: "We respect others' intellectual property rights, and we reserve the right to delete or disable Content alleged to be infringing such intellectual property rights, and to terminate the accounts of repeat alleged infringers"

points.title: This service cannot be held responsible for disputes that you may have with other users
points.status: "11.6 If there is a dispute solely between participants on this site, or solely between users and a third party, you agree that ContextLogic is under no obligation to become involved."

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in Amsterdam, Netherlands
points.status: "Unless one of the following exceptions applies, the exclusive place of jurisdiction for all disputes arising from this contract and your use of the Services is our registered office (Amsterdam, NL)."

points.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
points.status: "To the extent permitted by applicable law, ContextLogic limits or excludes its liability for: (i) your use of the Services, including any downtime or periods of unavailability; (ii) products, information or other content provided by third parties; (iii) the use of products purchased from Merchants; or (iv) any indirect, consequential or special damages. "

points.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
points.status: "Through your account "Settings" you are able to access, edit or delete information you've provided to us"

points.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
points.status: "However, if you decline Cookies, you may not be able to take advantage of certain site features, services, or apps."

points.title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data
points.status: "Portability - In certain situations, you may ask us to transfer your personal data directly to you. On your request, and where feasible, we will transfer your personal information to another party that you select."

points.title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations
points.status: "We keep your information for the time period required to complete the purposes for which it is processed or satisfy legal retention requirements. The length of time for which we retain information depends on the purposes for which we collected and use it or the requirements of applicable laws."

points.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
points.status: "If you do not want to receive emails from us regarding special promotions or offers, you may (1) follow the unsubscribe options at the bottom of each email; or (2) visit your account settings pages."

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
points.status: "We use analytics tools and providers to understand better how individuals and their devices interact with the Services. Google Analytics is important to our analytics"

points.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates
points.status: "Examples of the information we collect automatically are: [...] Location information - general location information from your computer or mobile device or precise GPS location information from your mobile device."

points.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for advertising
points.status: "We may use services, like Facebook, to serve tailored ads to you about the Services, our companies or products we are developing. And these services often use Cookies."

points.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
points.status: "Usage Data, such as: web log data, referring and exit pages and URLs"

points.title: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable
points.status: "We reserve the right to access, read, preserve, and disclose any information that we in good faith believe is necessary to comply with law or court order; enforce or apply our Terms of Use and other agreements; or protect the rights, property, or safety of ContextLogic, our employees, our users, or others."

points.title: The service uses your personal data for advertising
points.status: "Some specific examples of how we use information are: [...] Analyze use of the Services and personalize content, including ads and prices"

points.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes
points.status: "Some specific examples of how we use information are: [...] Advertise and market the Services, including in email or other channels"

points.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties
points.status: "We may gather information, including demographic and statistical information from third-parties, such as business partners, marketers, researchers, analysts."

points.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data
points.status: "HOW WE USE INFORMATION"

points.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
points.status: "We employ other companies and people to perform tasks or services on our behalf and need to share information with them so they can complete their work. For example: we may use a payment processing company to receive or deliver payments; or we may use a cloud services provider to store data."

points.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
points.status: "Our Services do not support Do Not Track requests at this time, which means that we collect information about your online activity both while you are using the Services and after you leave our Services."

points.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
points.status: "We reserve the right to access, read, preserve, and disclose any information that we in good faith believe is necessary to comply with law or court order; enforce or apply our Terms of Use and other agreements; or protect the rights, property, or safety of ContextLogic, our employees, our users, or others."

points.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons and device fingerprinting on users.
points.status: "Examples of the information we collect automatically are: Unique Identifiers [...] We and others may use cookies [...] or related technologies, such as web beacons, local shared objects and tracking pixels to store or collect information ("Cookies")."

points.title: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online
points.status: "Use caution and good judgment before sharing personal information in public areas of the Services."

points.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
points.status: "By using the Services you: [...] Consent to having your information transferred to our affiliates and facilities in the United States or elsewhere or to facilities of third-parties with whom we share information as described in this Privacy Policy."

points.title: This service tracks you on other websites
points.status: "We may use first-party Cookies or allow others to set and read (e.g. use) third-party Cookies to gather data, deliver content, including ads relevant to your interests, on our sites or on third party sites. "

points.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
points.status: "We may choose to buy or sell assets and may share or transfer user information (including personal information) in connection with the evaluation of and entry into such transactions. Also, if we (or our assets) are acquired, or if we go out of business, enter bankruptcy, or go through some other change of control, user information could be one of the assets transferred to or acquired by a third-party."

points.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not involved in its operation
points.status: "We may allow advertisers, including merchants ("Advertisers"), to choose groups of users to see their listings, advertisements or promotional offers based on common features of a group of users, such as similar usage patterns or similar geographic locations. "

points.title: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service
points.status: "Objection - In certain situations, you may have a right to object to the processing of your personal data. The reason(s) for an objection must relate to your particular circumstances, such as processing of your personal data for direct marketing purposes."

points.title: The service can delete specific content without reason and may do it without prior notice
points.status: "ContextLogic enables you to generate ratings and reviews, photos, videos or other content about Products and stores on the Marketplace Apps ("Feedback"). [...] We reserve the right to exclude such Feedback for any reason or no reason, without notice to you. For example, we may exclude Feedback if we determine, in our sole discretion, that any rating or review could diminish the integrity of the ratings and reviews."

points.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
points.status: "INFORMATION WE COLLECT & USE"
